tool.name: Sequence clustering

param.name: seq_id
param.label: Use sequence identity?
param.help: Do not use local unless use alignment coverage controls

param.name: cluster
param.label: Cluster sequence to the first cluster that meet the threshold (or into the most similar cluster that meet the threshold)?
param.help: It won't change the representatives of final clusters

param.name: seq_id_threshold
param.label: Sequence identity threshold
param.help: Number of identical amino acids in alignment divided by the full length of the shorter sequence

param.name: length_diff_cutoff
param.label: Length difference cutoff
param.help: If set to 0.9, the shorter sequences need to be at least 90% length of the representative of the cluster

param.name: aa_length_diff_cutoff
param.label: Length difference cutoff in amino acid
param.help: If set to 60, the length difference between the shorter sequences and the representative of the cluster can not be bigger than 60

param.name: longer_seq_alignment_coverage
param.label: Alignment coverage for the longer sequence
param.help: If set to 0.9, the alignment must covers 90% of the sequence

param.name: longer_seq_alignment_coverage_control
param.label: Alignment coverage control for the longer sequence
param.help: If set to 60, and the length of the sequence is 400, then the alignment must be >= 340 (400-60) residues

param.name: shorter_seq_alignment_coverage
param.label: Alignment coverage for the shorter sequence
param.help: If set to 0.9, the alignment must covers 90% of the sequence

param.name: shorter_seq_alignment_coverage_control
param.label: Alignment coverage control for the shorter sequence
param.help: If set to 60, and the length of the sequence is 400, then the alignment must be >= 340 (400-60) residues

param.name: minimal_seq_alignment_coverage_control
param.label: Minimal alignment coverage control for the both sequences
param.help: Alignment must cover >= this value for both sequences

param.name: longer_seq_max_unmatched_percentage
param.label: Maximum unmatched percentage for the longer sequence
param.help: If set to 0.1, the unmatched region (excluding leading and tailing gaps) must not be more than 10% of the sequence

param.name: shorter_seq_max_unmatched_percentage
param.label: Maximum unmatched percentage for the shorter sequence
param.help: If set to 0.1, the unmatched region (excluding leading and tailing gaps) must not be more than 10% of the sequence

param.name: max_unmatched_length
param.label: Maximum unmatched length
param.help: If set to 10, the unmatched region (excluding leading and tailing gaps) must not be more than 10 bases

param.name: description_length
param.label: Length of description in cltr file
param.help: If set to 0, it takes the fasta defline and stops at first space

tool.help:
**What it does**
CD-HIT clusters proteins into clusters that meet a user-defined similarity threshold, usually a sequence identity. Each cluster has one representative sequence.
